channel.title: Cover Songs on Morihiro Music
channel.description: Recent content in Cover Songs on Morihiro Music

item.title: Panis Angelicus
item.description: Original Music by C.Franck (1872) Vocals : Mr.Takeda and Morihiro Synthesizer Programming : Morihiro Panis angelicus fit panis hominum; Dat panis coelicus figuris terminum: O res mirabilis! Manducat Dominum Pauper, servus et humilis. 天使のパンは 人々のパンとなり その天のパンは 世にいのちをもたらす 大いなる恵みかな 主を食するとは 貧しくいやしきこのしもべが

item.title: ソーラン節
item.description: Japanese traditional music arranged and performed by Morihiro with Roland XP-10 Synthesizer

item.title: Greensleeves on Stratocaster
item.description: English Traditional Music performed by Morihiro with Fender Stratocaster ST-58TX

item.title: 僕が僕であるために
item.description: Original Song by Yutaka Ozaki Performed by Morihiro and Nakagarfunkel at CTC Live

item.title: 秋桜
item.description: Original Song by Masashi Sada Performed by Morihiro and Nakagarfunkel at CTC Live

item.title: Love Theme from St. Elmo’s Fire
item.description: Original Song from Motion Picture Soundtrack St. Elmo's Fire (1985) Performed by Morihiro (Electric Guitar and Synthesizer Programming)

item.title: G線上のアリア
item.description: Music by J.S.Bach (1731) Performed by Morihiro Electric Guitar : Steinburger Spirit with Zoom MS-50G Synthesizer Programming : Sampletank 2.5 with CSR Hall Reverb

item.title: Parisienne Walkways
item.description: Original Song by Gary Moore (1978) Performed by Morihiro (Electric Guitar and Synthesizer Programming)

item.title: 歌の翼に(Rock Version)
item.description: Music by F. Mendelssohn (1834) Performed by Morihiro (Electric Guitar and Synthesizer Programming)

item.title: Geboren um zu leben (Born to Live)
item.description: Original Song by Unheilig (2010) Vocal by Mr.Takeda Synthesizer Programming by Morihiro

item.title: Panis Angelicus
item.description: Original Music by C.Franck (1872) Vocals : Mr.Takeda and Morihiro Synthesizer Programming : Morihiro Panis angelicus fit panis hominum; Dat panis coelicus figuris terminum: O res mirabilis! Manducat Dominum Pauper, servus et humilis. 天使のパンは 人々のパンとなり その天のパンは 世にいのちをもたらす 大いなる恵みかな 主を食するとは 貧しくいやしきこのしもべが

item.title: You Raise Me Up
item.description: Original Song by Secret Garden (2002) Vocal by Mr.Takeda Synthesizer Programming by Morihiro

item.title: Greatest Love of All
item.description: Original Song by Whitney Huston Performed by Morihiro in 2003

item.title: Time Passed Me By
item.description: 幼い日の甘い追憶を呼び覚ます TM Network　珠玉のバラード
